content: प्रतन् {c8c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To spread abroad, diffuse; ख्यातस्त्वं विभवैर्यशांसि कवयो दिक्षु प्रतन्वंति नः <ls>Bh. 3. 24.</ls> {@--2@} To spread, extend, stretch out. {@--3@} To spread over, cover, fill. {@--4@} To cause, produce, create. {@--5@} To show, display, exhibit; तदूरीकृत्य कृतिभिर्वाचस्पत्यं प्रतायते <ls>Śi. 2. 30.</ls> {@--6@} To perform, do (as a sacrifice). {@--7@} To execute, complete, accomplish.
